description: The Miralga impact crater in Western Australia, once thought to be Earth’s oldest at 3.5 billion years, has now been redated to after 2.7 billion years ago. With a revised diameter of just 16 kilometers, the structure no longer supports theories of early crust or life formation, but remains scientifically valuable for studying Mars-like planetary geology.
title: Earth’s Oldest Impact Crater Turns Out to Be Much Younger, Scientists Reveal in New Study

description: In July 2025, a massive 8.8 earthquake off Russia's Kamchatka Peninsula triggered eruptions in seven volcanoes, including Klyuchevskaya Sopka and Shiveluch. Scientists called the rare multi-eruption event a “parade of volcanoes”—not witnessed in nearly 300 years. Experts believe the quake altered crustal stress, making eruptions more likely. Dormant volcano Krasheninnikov erupted for the first time in 500 years. Though the region is sparsely populated, ash plumes could affect air travel. Researchers are watching closely, but say it’s too soon to determine if all eruptions were directly triggered by the quake.
title: Massive Russia Earthquake Triggers Rare 'Parade' of 7 Kamchatka Volcanoes

description: NASA launched its twin TRACERS satellites on July 23, 2025, to study how solar wind causes magnetic reconnection in Earth's magnetosphere. However, a power issue on one spacecraft, SV1, has caused intermittent communication. Engineers believe the issue relates to sunlight availability on its solar panels and plan recovery efforts in August. Meanwhile, the second satellite, SV2, is healthy and undergoing final instrument commissioning. Once ready, SV2 will begin its science mission independently, while NASA works to recover SV1 and resume full dual-satellite operations critical to the mission’s original research goals.
title: NASA's TRACERS Satellites Begin Solar Wind Study Despite SV1 Glitch

description: A new study proposes that life may exist far from sunlight in a “radiolytic habitable zone” deep beneath the icy surfaces of Mars, Europa, and Enceladus. Cosmic rays, which can penetrate rock and ice, break water molecules apart to release hydrogen, oxygen, and energy-rich electrons. These can fuel microbes in subsurface water, much like bacteria living deep below Earth. Simulations show Enceladus has the strongest potential for such life, followed by Mars and Europa. This expands the search for life to darker, colder environments—even on rogue planets adrift in space.
title: Scientists Explore Role of Space Radiation in Powering Alien Microbial Life

description: Chakravyuham is a crime thriller movie that follows a woman named Siri, who is found dead with her throat slit. S.I. Sathya then begins to investigate the murder. As the process commences, he uncovers the darkest secrets and disturbing truths. Streaming now on AhaTamil.
title: Chakravyuham Now Streaming on Aha Tamil: Everything You Need to Know

description: Written and directed by Utsav Gonwar, Photo is a drama movie that revolves around a daily wage worker and his son, who are trapped in the lockdown due to the immediate lockdown. However, they decide to walk back to their hometown, with no transport available. The movie explores social and political issues. ‘
title: Photo Available for Rent on Amazon Prime Video: What You Need to Know About This Kannada Drama Movie

description: Based on J.P. Monninger’s novel, it follows two strangers whose chance meeting on a train leads to a journey through Spain, Portugal, and Italy. Romantic drama The Map That Leads To You, starring Madelyn Cline and KJ Apa, arrives on Prime Video on August 20, 2025. Directed by Lasse Hallström, it’s a visually rich love story set across Europe.
title: The Map That Leads To You OTT Release Date: When and Where to Watch it Online?

description: The Society, hosted by comedian Munawar Faruqui, is set to host the reality show. 25 contestants, divided into 3 categories, depict the game of power and class, fighting to win the title of Asli Bazigar. Four episodes are released, and a new episode is released each day. Watch The Society, which is now streaming on Jio Hotstar.
title: The Society Now Streaming on JioHotstar: Everything You Need to Know About Munawar Faruqui Starrer Reality Show

description: From smartphones and laptops to smart TVs and home appliances, several items are available at discounted rates in the ongoing Amazon Great Freedom Festival 2025. Here we have rounded up some of the most popular deals on smart TVs. Buyers can save extra on these products by applying bank offers and coupon discounts. Shoppers can also avail of no-cost EMIs and exchange offers.
title: Amazon Great Freedom Festival Sale 2025: Limited-Time Deals on Smart TVs From Xiaomi, LG, Samsung and More

description: Garmin Forerunner 970 and Forerunner 570 smartwatches have been launched in India. They come with AMOLED displays and offer Bluetooth and ANT+ connectivity options. They house various sensors to track health and fitness. The Forerunner 970 model is claimed to deliver up to 15 days of use when it is running in smartwatch mode.
title: Garmin Forerunner 970, Forerunner 570 With AMOLED Displays, Built-In GPS Support Launched in India

description: Developer MiHoYo is discontinuing Genshin Impact on PS4, citing hardware limitations and platform application size. The PS4 version of the game will be delisted from the PlayStation Store in September, with all updates and in-game purchases stopping next year.
title: Genshin Impact to Be Discontinued on PS4 Over Hardware Limitations, Platform Application Size

description: Lava Blaze AMOLED 2 5G design has been teased online by the Indian smartphone manufacturer, along with its key specifications. The handset is confirmed to sport a full-HD+ resolution AMOLED touchscreen. It will feature a dual rear camera setup, housed inside a rectangular camera module.
title: Lava Blaze AMOLED 2 5G Design, Key Specifications Revealed Ahead of India Launch

description: OnePlus 15 is expected to go official later this year as a successor to OnePlus 13. A new leak suggests that the upcoming flagship will come with an updated design language. OnePlus 15 will feature a flat display with a 1.5K resolution.
title: OnePlus 15 Specifications Leaked; Said to Feature Refreshed Design With Square Rear Camera Module

description: Poco could launch a new smartphone soon in India, which is said to be named Poco M7 Plus. Ahead of its suspected launch, the Chinese smartphone brand has teased the battery configuration of a new handset, which is said to be for the Poco M7 Plus. The phone could sport a 6.9-inch display.
title: Poco M7 Plus Price and Battery Specifications Teased; Confirmed to Debut With Silicon-Carbon Battery

description: The Amazon Great Freedom Festival Sale 2025 has entered its seventh day in India. From smartphones and tablets to ACs and other home appliances, there are discounts and other offers on a wide range of products. If a top-of-the-range smartphone to fulfill your requirements is what you are after, then you can take a look at this deal on the Samsung Galaxy S25 Ultra as well.
title: Amazon Great Freedom Festival Sale 2025: Samsung Galaxy S25 Ultra Deal Slashes Price by 17 Percent

description: Amazon Great Freedom Festival Sale 2025 began on August 31 at midnight for Prime subscribers, giving them early access. Now, the sale is about to conclude. Till tomorrow, interested customers can buy a new smartphone at a discounted rate, along with additional cashback offers.
title: Amazon Great Freedom Festival Sale 2025: Top Deals on Smartphones From Samsung, Redmi, Realme, and More

description: Microsoft seems to be planning a major overhaul with the upcoming versions of its Windows operating system (OS). The Redmond-based tech giant shared a new video on Monday dubbed Windows 2030 Vision, teasing what the OS would look like in five years’ time. In the video, a Microsoft executive claimed that the OS could have a deeper artificial intelligence (AI) integration and could support more advanced agentic workflows.
title: Microsoft Teases Windows 2030 Vision with Multimodal AI Agent-Driven Interfaces

description: Amazon Great Freedom Festival Sale 2025 has entered its seventh day after starting on July 31. The e-commerce giant’s annual Indian Independence Day-focused sale offers a wide range of products with lucrative discounts, including smartphones, smartwatches, speakers, earphones, headphones, power banks, tablets, laptops, as well as a variety of home appliances.
title: Amazon Great Freedom Festival Sale 2025: Best End of Season Discounts on Air Conditioners

description: The Amazon Great Freedom Festival Sale 2025 in India is all set to end tomorrow (August 7). Apart from deals on top brands, the e-commerce giant is also offering smart speakers from its in-house Echo lineup with discounts. So, in case you’re contemplating a new smart speaker purchase, then our latest article comprising the best deals on Amazon smart speakers might come to your aid.
title: Amazon Great Freedom Festival Sale 2025 Brings Big Discounts on Echo Smart Speakers

description: From smartphones and laptops to smart TVs and home appliances, several items are available at discounted rates in the ongoing Amazon Great Freedom Festival 2025. Here we have rounded up some of the most popular deals on smart TVs. Buyers can save extra on these products by applying bank offers and coupon discounts. Shoppers can also avail of no-cost EMIs and exchange offers.
title: Amazon Great Freedom Festival Sale 2025: Limited-Time Deals on Smart TVs From Xiaomi, LG, Samsung and More

description: Amazon Great Freedom Festival Sale 2025, which began on August 31 at midnight for Prime subscribers and at noon for others, is providing various cashback offers, credit card discounts, and exchange offers on different gadgets. Here's how you can buy mobile accessories at discounted prices, while using cashback offers to lower the cost of your purchases.
title: Amazon Great Freedom Festival Sale 2025: Top Deals on Mobile Accessories From Xiaomi, Ambrane, and More

description: Vivo V50e was unveiled in India in April as the successor to the V40e. The new model is equipped with the MediaTek Dimensity 7300 SoC and a dual rear camera setup. It features a 5,600mAh battery with 90W fast charging support, a quad-curved display, and is rated for IP68/IP69 protection. Do all these features warrant an upgrade over the Vivo V40e? Find out in our review.
title: Vivo V50e Review: E for Enough?

description: Apple is yet to confirm the arrival of the new  Apple TV 4K, but a leak suggests that a new model is finally on the way. The new model is expected to feature an upgraded chip and could offer support for Wi-Fi 7. The current Apple TV 4K was launched back in 2022, equipped with the A15 Bionic chip. It offers support for the HDR10+ format. It includes a Siri remote.
title: Apple TV 4K Refresh Reportedly Arriving This Year With Improved Performance, Connectivity

description: Apple’s first artificial intelligence (AI) chatbot is reportedly being rolled out to some users. As per the report, the chatbot is available within the Apple Support app, and is called the Support Assistant. It is said to assist users with common issues around users’ devices and the company’s services.
title: Apple's Support App Reportedly Updated With AI-Powered Chatbot
More Than a Pulse: How Galaxy Watch8 Series’ Vascular Load Management Redefines Cardiovascular Health

description: Nintendo has announced an Indie World Showcase for upcoming indie games on Switch and Switch 2. The showcase will take place on Thursday, August 7 at 6 am PT (6.30 pm IST). It will be roughly 15 minutes long and will be broadcast on Nintendo's YouTube channel.
title: Nintendo Will Host an Indie World Showcase for Switch and Switch 2 Games This Week

description: Nothing Essential Space, the artificial intelligence (AI)-enabled hub for organising information, has now been updated with two new features. Triggered with the help of a dedicated AI button on the side, Essential Space allows users to quickly capture the information on the display to transcribe and summarise it.
title: Nothing's Essential Space Updated With Ability to Share Memories, Flip-to-Record Audio Clips

description: OpenAI released two open-source artificial intelligence (AI) models on Tuesday. This marks the San Francisco-based AI firm’s first contribution to the open community since 2019, when GPT-2 was released in open-source. The two new models, dubbed gpt-oss-120b and gpt-oss-20b, are said to offer comparable performance as the o3 and o3-mini models.
title: OpenAI Releases Two Open-Source AI Models That Performs on Par With o3, o3-Mini

description: Ray-Ban Meta Glasses feature a circular 12-megapixel camera along with an LED light to inform people in front of the wearer that they are being recorded, ensuring privacy. People have been trying to hide this recording indicator for a while, however to no avail. But a car customisation company might have unfortunately found a way around.
title: Ray-Ban Meta AI Glasses Reportedly Thwart Stickers Used to Block Recording Indicator Light

description: Xiaomi India on Wednesday announced a new visual identity for its sub-brand Redmi in the country. Calling it a pivotal step in the brand’s evolution, the China-based OEM said that the Redmi 15 5G will be the first handset to come with the updated brand identity. As part of the changes, the Redmi branding will have a new logo, featuring all uppercase text in a red colourway.
title: Xiaomi Unveils New Redmi Logo, Updated Visual Identity to Debut With Redmi 15 5G on August 19

description: Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 7 Teardown video was released by iFixit to give a glimpse of its internals and rate its repairability. The flagship phone gets a poor rating in the teardown. It has tightly packed components and a fragile inner display. Sourcing parts of the phone also said to be difficult. It gets a repairability score of three out of 10.
title: Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 7 Teardown Video Indicates Self-Repair Enthusiasts Might Struggle to Disassemble the Phone

description: Microsoft has announced the titles joining Xbox Game Pass in the first half of August. The lineup of games is led by Ubisoft's Assassin's Creed Mirage. Other games joining the service include Rain World, Aliens: Fireteam Elite, 9 Kings and more.
title: Xbox Game Pass Wave 1 Titles for August Announced: Assassin's Creed Mirage, Rain World and More

description: Google added a new quality-of-life feature to its Gemini chatbot on Tuesday. The artificial intelligence (AI) chatbot can now generate custom illustrated storybooks based on text prompts, uploaded images or documents. Users can also specify the style of the artwork in the storybook, as well as instruct Gemini to use specific names of characters, settings, or even plot points.
title: Gemini's Storybook Feature Lets You Generate New Illustrated Books With Read-Aloud Narration

description: Google Pixel 10 Pro Fold and Pixel Watch 4 could be launched alongside the Pixel 10 series phones. However, a new report, citing a reliable source, suggests that the smartwatch and the foldable handset might not be available to customers before October.
title: Google Pixel 10 Pro, Pixel Watch 4 Reportedly Facing Delays Due to Supply Chain Issues

description: Google on Tuesday released the monthly software update for Pixel smartphones. Based on the latest Android 16 build, it carries fixes for several system issues which were discovered in previous iterations. As per Google, the update patches a bug that caused issues with the three-button and gesture navigation. Further, Pixel users can expect general improvements in system stability and performance. There is also the August 2025 Security Patch for Pixel in tow.
title: Google's Pixel Phones Get August 2025 Update With Fixes for Navigation Bug, Security Flaws

description: Apple released the iOS Beta 5 update for iPhone on Tuesday. Currently available to developers and beta testers, it contains subtle changes over the previous iteration that was introduced last month. As per a report, the Dynamic Island will now show a warning when the iPhone has low battery. There is reportedly also a new animation when the passcode screen on the lock screen appears.
title: iOS 26 Beta 5 Update Rolls Out With Dynamic Island Battery Warning, New Passcode Animation

description: Motorola has partnered with Swarovski to announce a crystal-studded edition of the Razr 60 and Moto Buds Loop. The new Brilliant Collection will be available in limited quantities and confirmed to be available in most markets globally.
title: Motorola Razr 60, Moto Buds Loop Now Available in Swarovski Crystal-Studded 'Brilliant Collection'

description: Grok Imagine was officially released on Sunday as a multimodal feature that can generate images and videos. It is currently available in beta to all SuperGrok and Premium+ X subscribers on the iOS app. The feature also comes with a Spicy mode which can generate not-safe-for-work (NSFW) content of explicit nature.
title: Grok's Imagine Feature Updated With 'Spicy' Mode for NSFW AI-Generated Images and Videos

description: Samsung on Tuesday announced the expansion of its One UI 8 Beta programme to more Galaxy devices and markets. The South Korean tech conglomerate is bringing the Android 16-based beta programme to its older handsets including the Galaxy S24 series and Galaxy Z Fold 6 and Z Flip 6, and more. The update bumps up the OS version to Android 16 and carries multimodal capabilities, along with new features related to accessibility, productivity, and security..
title: Samsung Expands One UI 8 Beta to Galaxy S24 Series, Galaxy Z Fold 6 in India and Other Markets

description: WhatsApp is rolling out a new scam prevention tool, it announced on Tuesday. This feature, dubbed Safety Overview, works when someone who is not saved in your contacts adds you to a WhatsApp group. The Meta-owned messaging app will provide key information about the group, along with tips to stay safe from phishing and scams. As part of its ongoing efforts to protect its users from scams, it detected and banned more than 6.8 million accounts linked to scam centres.
title: WhatsApp Rolls Out Safety Overview Which Lets You Review Group Information for Protection Against Scams

description: Bharat Sanchar Nigam Limited (BSNL) has made a series of strategic announcements in recent months. From the Re. 1 Freedom Offer and the Q-5G Service to the doorstep delivery of SIM cards, these initiatives underscore BSNL’s attempts to not only attract new subscribers but also challenge private players in India’s telecom space. Here are five of the most recent announcements from BSNL.
title: BSNL Updates: From Re 1 Plan to Q-5G Service; Here Are Five Recent Announcements
